name: jenkins
description: Jenkins with a list of plugins to install on build stage.

scripts.up: docker run -d --name jenkins -e JAVA_OPTS="-Djava.awt.headless=true" -e PLUGINS_FORCE_UPGRADE=true -e TRY_UPGRADE_IF_NO_MARKER=true -v jenkins_home:/var/jenkins_home -p 8080:8080 jenkins:latest
scripts.restart: npm run down && npm run up
scripts.up:test: docker run -d --name jenkins-test -e JAVA_OPTS="-Djava.awt.headless=true" -e PLUGINS_FORCE_UPGRADE=true -e TRY_UPGRADE_IF_NO_MARKER=true -v jenkins_home:/var/jenkins_home -p 8080:8080 jenkins:test
scripts.restart:test: npm run down:test && npm run up:test
scripts.prune: npm run prune:system && npm run prune:container && npm run prune:network && npm run prune:volume && npm run prune:image

author: gpedro34 - http://github.com/gpedro34
